steps.1: Weigh out 30g of whole bean coffee
steps.3: Grind coffee beans to medium consistency
steps.4: Dump coffee grounds into filter basket
steps.5: Place AeroPress on your favorite mug
steps.6: Pour heated water into brewing chamber up to the '2' marker
steps.7: Brew for 15 seconds...no more, no less
steps.9: Add more hot water and half and half to taste
